column1: vyctornikiforov 160117915735 "2017-04-29 13:56:39 GMT" http://vyctornikiforov.tumblr.com/post/160117915735 "thatshamelessyaoishipper: Okay okay
column2: let me get this out beforehand: I know we all wanted a second season. BUT it is not uncommon for an anime to get a movie sequel
column3: followed by another TV anime sequel. K project did that - it was originally a TV anime that then got a movie that ended on a cliffhanger
column4: that then received a second season. A second season announcement can come either in the credits of the movie or from the creators themselves at a later time. And think about it: two TV anime seasons and one anime movie? How much better does it get? It‚Äôs like getting two seasons and a half. And yes
column5: I do believe that a TV anime sequel is likely after the theatrical movie. And let‚Äôs look at other positives! The animation will be absolutely gorgeous??? This time for sure
column6: since movies work on completely different schedules and they are polished to be absolute goddamn masterpieces of animation (see: practically any theatrical anime movie). Not to mention that this pretty much solves the issue of the rest of the skating season that we see in the anime? Of course
column7: we don‚Äôt yet know what the movie will be about
column8: but if it finished up the skating season we begun in season one (we got about halfway through the season)
column9: then that can be a beautiful segway to a season 2 set in the off-season + the next skating season. It‚Äôs like we‚Äôre not missing out on any story content! Isn‚Äôt that perfect? Honestly
column10: I‚Äôm very excited for this. This is probably the best way to solve the issue created by the fact that the first season ended halfway through the skating season. So while I know that many of us may feel a little disappointed
column11: this will definitely turn out to be a good thing. :D " False text

column1: vyctornikiforov 142792786250 "2016-04-14 14:12:36 GMT" http://vyctornikiforov.tumblr.com/post/142792786250 "attackonmyponderland:  The equine world is bloodthirsty and cut-throat: this is what Jean Kirschtein learns from the outset. His father runs the elite Trost Riding Academy
column2: a chance for those who can afford it to ride the best-class and highest quality mares and geldings from across the country and compete in competitions to make their names. Winning is prized above all else- but that‚Äôs not what on Jean‚Äôs mind. After meeting a nervous yet beautiful boy at a local showgrounds and seeing his giant black horse stop for him in a moment of madness
column3: Jean knows /exactly/ where he wants to be spending the summer. He sees the potential the shy boy with freckles hides from everyone else
column4: and is determined to get his nerve back before the summer ends. But he didn‚Äôt factor in the possibility that the anxious freckled idiot known as Marco Bodt was cute. Like
column5: stupidly cute. Not to mention that Jean has his own demons to fight‚Ä¶ Hackamore is a story about the side no one saw
column6: the side that has the bruises and anger and horses behaving badly- but Marco Bodt makes everything worthwhile. ((Jean‚Äôs pov of No Reins))  So this is what I‚Äôve been doing and keeping so quiet over (well that and the fact that I‚Äôve been really busy and oddly social lately orz) But huzzah
column7: a Hackamore chapter! And it‚Äôs a beast of one :‚ÄôD enjoy one and all!¬† " False link

column1: vyctornikiforov 136748701910 "2016-01-06 15:19:10 GMT" http://vyctornikiforov.tumblr.com/post/136748701910 "thegirlonfandoms: hinalilly:  tenbitchyfingers:  fencer-x:  jd190:  fencer-x:  peachtiger: Hey guys
column2: as you know KyoAni showed their appreciation for our RH scrapbook
column3: but¬†‚Äúcertain fans‚Äù are not too happy about it getting attention and are making a bunch of rude comments. Please come and help drown out the hate
column4: show Kyoani that we‚Äôre thankful for them featuring our hard work
column5: and allowing us to express how much we love both Rin and Haruka . Much thanks in advance guys. So‚Ä¶now we‚Äôre not allowed to be happy that people we gave a gift to said ‚Äòthank you‚Äô? You‚Äôre going to harass them for saying THANK YOU?? Where do people get the GALL to do shit like this in public to the creators? I recall people going to the official channel for the duet CD and downvoting the OFFICIAL PROMO VIDEO for the harurin duet CD just because they didn‚Äôt like the ship. That is some next-level fuckery there. Why not channel that salt into making something nice like this for your favorite characters too??  You are absolutely allowed to be happy but that is not the problem here. I am not part of this fandom but I have friends who are so this is my perspective on the whole matter. This ‚Äúcomment‚Äù was directed toward Kyoani themselves. The MH shippers worked their butts off making a huge box which was sent to Kyoani and they barely said anything to recognize all the work those fans put into it. It‚Äôs a shame that these ship wars happen but come on
column6: being horribly mean to everyone and saying that the MH fans didn‚Äôt do anything for their favorite characters or should ‚Äúchannel that salt into making something"" is incredibly rude and shows how little you seem to care about other peoples‚Äô feelings.  I will state this again: The ‚Äúcertain fans‚Äù are NOT UPSET about this getting attention. Far from it. They ARE upset with Kyoani and how they seemed to disregard all the work put in to making an amazing gift box for them which felt like a slap in the face.  So the solution for hurt feelings is‚Ä¶to publicly lambaste KyoAni? There are probably a dozen reasons this project got a pic and public tweet and the other one didn‚Äôt; having seen the other project‚Äôs pics
column7: I half wonder if a box that was supposed to be for Makoto‚Äôs bday but contained a heck of a lot of MH shippy content wasn‚Äòt deemed inappropriate to publicly post a picture of‚Ä¶ (this book had explicit rules set up to keep it from being overtly shippy even though the entire point was to express gratitude for the mook).
